name: Modular UFO
description:
Planning to make a "real" UFO video or are you just looking for some content to start a space game?

Here are my modular UFO-components for creating a lot of different looking UFOs.

Blender 2.8 Setup Video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wjNciFETMOc&feature=youtu.be

The animation on Sketchfab shows some different ufo types by adding and removing some of the modular components.
https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/modular-ufos-778e0ad30ebf4e509816c5dcb3afcd6b

Modeled and animated in Blender 2.75 for the textures I have used 3d-coat (2016).

---
My name is Dennis Haupt. 3D-artist for modeling, texturing, rigging and animation since 2008. My favorite software is Blender 3d but I also work with 3d-Coat or other 3d/2d-programs.​​

Location: Germany - Thuringia - Ilmenau

---
System:
Alienware 18: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4930MX CPU @ 3.00GHz NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780M x2 (SLI) 32,0 GB RAM
